comments:
I have a plugin 
<extension point="org.eclipse.ui.popupMenus">
  <objectContribution id="..."
   objectClass="org.eclipse.debug.core.model.IVariable">
...
Some times, I get a NullPointerException if I right-click on an array in the Variables pane.
It can be reproduced if you have an instance of org.eclipse.swt.graphics.PaletteData in the debugger, right click on its "palette" member and select the popup menu.

Stack trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jdi.internal.ReferenceTypeImpl.create(ReferenceTypeImpl.java:1038)
